dialogueLines.line: What's this flyer over here say?
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: [The annual marksman tournament takes place today. Test your skills in competition shooting and you could win cash prize of $75,000. The tournament takes place today at the address below.]
Cash prize, you say? Count me in.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: The address on this flyer is quite far away.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Looks like I've got some walking to do.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico
